1_12fSitbSXCwW7nAiyV7jWzrbkkvVBMvHDc.body:
I,m very sorry but on the site from previous link something was wrong with clonning.

Here is new , updated and working page.

 http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HsR2PSsZqgjFiBh4tj5uBM6mqVaYyAY65/

Page updated: fixed bug in links (zip/rar). 
Thanks all for informations !!! . If any questions don't hesitate to write me a message .

This is not the target page where you can multiply your btc. These are sample scripts that are used to reproduce currency. Everyone knows that it works on the principle of pyramid scheme and investment platform in one. If You don't know pls use google or something like that and read...
